friction_points: Initial response may have surfaced too much context when user just wanted a quick check-in
smooth_moments: Quick acknowledgment and dropping of unwanted topic
Good read of user's low energy state

self_critique.what_worked: Immediately complied with user's directive to drop the topic and adjusted approach
self_critique.what_failed: First response potentially over-contextualized when user may have just wanted simple acknowledgment
missed_opportunities: Could have asked more directly what user wanted to focus on instead of assuming
overcorrections: May have front-loaded too much context in opening response

pattern_detection.user_corrections_analysis: User correction shows preference for dropping topics completely rather than parking them - wants clean boundaries

improvement_actions: When user asks 'what were we discussing' at late hours, provide minimal context and ask what they want to focus on now
Read time context more carefully - 1:36 AM suggests different interaction mode needed

neutral_ai_impact: Topic surfacing was neither particularly helpful nor harmful
